name: Awesome Roast Beef
author: Dawn
summary: This rump roast in mushroom soup and beef broth is tender and very moist. It's made in the slow cooker, and is very easy to make. Raw vegetables, such as carrots and potatoes, may be added at the start of the cooking time, if desired. My whole family loves this recipe. The leftovers also make great roast beef sandwiches.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Place rump roast in a slow cooker
Pour in condensed cream of mushroom soup and condensed beef broth
Cook on LOW for about 8 hours
